keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The advocacy group, which has worked in the country for decades, said the rejection was “part of a pattern” of actions by the government to close off criticism.
snippet: The advocacy group, which has worked in the country for decades, said the rejection was “part of a pattern” of actions by the government to close off criticism....

headline.main: Israel Denies a Work Visa to Human Rights Watch Researcher
headline.print_headline: Israel Denies Work Visa to a Researcher
